categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Nyzes was a male Human colonel of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY he was stationed on Alderaan.

Colonel Nyzes appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission "In the Halls of Elysium" on Alderaan only if the player takes the dark side option to ignore Elana Thul's call for help and leave her to die. In that case, Nyzes will meet the player at the spaceport and inform Kallig about Elana's death.
